name: Weapon: 2HVY (GMTK-Game Jam)
description:
CONGRATULATIONS! You have been selected to test the Brand New, State Of The Art 2HVY: Heavy Duty Super Colliding Super Cannon! Please enjoy the complementary hostile aliens to blow up during the testing period. (Technical difficulty including the inability to aim was occur.)

This is my entry into the 2018 GMTK Game-Jam! I interpreted this year theme (GENRE without MECHANIC) as a Top Down Shooter without Aiming. So every time you fire your weapon it points to a new random direction, so in order to hit anything you must use strategic positioning and  timing to align your laser and fire!

CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROEW KEYS: Move

SPACE: Fire/Re-Aim 

CREDIT:

Code: Made by me in Construct 2

Art: Made by me in Paint.net

Sound: Made by me in BFXR
